title: Now Riot still has a lot of things to change in this game but...
body: I was wondering what is your favorite thing they've already changed, personally I am impressed by the skin quality increase what would of been a 1350-1820rp skin a few seasons ago is now considered a regular 975 skin, the old 975 skins were usually just model changes and now a 975 almost always has new particles and is just generally much higher quality.

replies.body:
Not all changes are good.

RIP Journal of Justice.

Yes Rito, fix for RADS error on mac.

...pls
All the visual upgrades, to everything, SR, champions, skins, everything
